title: entanucu varnintunE
sahitya:
entanucu varniNtunE I indirA ramaNuni nE



anupallavi



santatamu nammu sajjanula A santa dIrcu vasanta sukumAruni



caraNam 1



merugu bangAru cEla miravonda mariyu nUpuramunu ghallanaga

bhaktula gani

     karuNAmrtamu callaga yOgula daharamulu jhallanaga vEncEsina



caraNam 2



tilakamu celagaga jalajAkSuDilanu gadaluD vi vinipimpaga

tumburu nAra-

     dulu gani nutiyimpaga suralu sumamula vAna guriyimpaga

vEncEsina



caraNam 3



ghana nIlamunu gEru tanuvupai bunugu candanamu parimaLimpaga

bAgu ura-

     muna muktAmanu lADaga tyAgarAju gani celAgiyyaga vEncEsina
